name: BabySleep-immediatesoothingsound
0:
”Alexa, open baby sleep”
”Alexa, start baby sleep”
”Alexa, play baby sleep”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: baby sleep
des:
The sound will calm your baby and help into falling asleep. How to use this skill:

- Say Alexa, open Baby Sleep

 - When asked, define the number of hours for continuous playback

 - You can stop and resume at any time, or say next to go through the available sounds
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
